name: Tower Defense Demo (geostegma)
description:
This is a short demo which was created as part of my Game Software Engineering course. The goal of the game is to protect a crystal from hoards of incoming enemies by luring them towards carefully placed turrets.

Use the W, A, S, D keys or Arrow keys to move your character, and use the Space key to place turrets (holding the key positions your turret, releasing the key places them.)

Collect dropped resources from enemies to build more turrets.

*Hint: try and attract enemies away from your turrets in the beginning of the match.
